data.label: Dashboard
data.tooltip: Dashboard is your home screen. Navigate to your calendar, see notifications & the status of your students/advisees and Search to locate any student or colleague.

data.label: Courses
data.tooltip: Find all the courses where you have students in.

data.label: Cohorts
data.tooltip: Cohorts create and hold groups of students defined by you. Run reports on cohorts and view the individual status of each student within a cohort.

data.label: Reports
data.tooltip: Reports set parameters on any cohort group you create by date range, department, warning flags and/or declared major.

data.label: Surveys
data.tooltip: Here you can send out custom surveys for individual students or groups of students.

data.label: Department Settings
data.tooltip: Department Settings allow department heads to set thresholds for the number of flags that group students into On Path, At Risk and Off Path status.

data.label: Calendar
data.tooltip: Use Calendar to indicate your open times for meeting students so that they can schedule meetings with you. Set meetings and invite attendees with RSVP.

data.label: Rooms
data.tooltip: A place to store shared resources.
